name: The Brand Look and Feel Workshop
description:
Invite others into our design process, and empower them with the skills, tools, and language we use every day.


Use this template to run a brand look and feel workshop.

  • Include an extended team in the process of setting a visual direction (ie. for a branding project).
  • Build together a competitor and trends board, as well as adopt a shared language around designs.
  • Set the design direction and create a mood board for reference, as a team.


Duration: 20-minute prep offline, 30 minutes in-person or virtually.

Best for 4-6 participants
